# OpenTiles Learning System - LLM Navigation Index

> This file helps AI agents navigate the learning system documentation.
> Load this file first to understand what context is available.

## Project Structure

```
OpenTiles/
├── learning/          ← You are here (learning system)
│   ├── core/
│   ├── prompts/
│   └── ...
└── dev/               ← Learner's code projects
    ├── web/           ← React/Node web platform
    └── unity/         ← Unity game project
```

**Code Review Path**: `../dev/web/` or `../dev/unity/` (relative from learning folder)

## Quick Reference

### For Session Teacher
Load: core/learner-profile.md, core/current-focus.md, curriculum/current-term.md (daily brief section)
Total: ~2-3K tokens

### For Term Orchestrator
Load: core/learner-profile.md, core/current-focus.md, curriculum/current-term.md, progress/skills-log.md
Plus: Latest session handoff from sessions/
Total: ~4-5K tokens

### For Course Leader
Load: core/learner-profile.md, core/current-focus.md, progress/milestones.md, progress/skills-log.md
Plus: Last 2-3 term summaries from curriculum/term-history/
Total: ~5-6K tokens

## File Index

### Core Context (Always Load)
| File | Tokens | Purpose | Updated By |
|------|--------|---------|------------|
| core/learner-profile.md | ~800 | Learner identity, goals, preferences | Course Leader (monthly) |
| core/current-focus.md | ~400 | Active objective, blockers, session count | Term Orchestrator (weekly) |

### Progress Tracking
| File | Tokens | Purpose | Updated By |
|------|--------|---------|------------|
| progress/skills-log.md | ~600 | Skill levels with timestamps | Term Orchestrator (weekly) |
| progress/milestones.md | ~600 | Phase gate checkpoints | Course Leader (monthly) |

### Curriculum
| File | Tokens | Purpose | Updated By |
|------|--------|---------|------------|
| curriculum/current-term.md | ~800 | Weekly plan, daily briefs | Term Orchestrator (weekly) |
| curriculum/term-history/*.md | ~1000 each | Archived term summaries | Term Orchestrator (end of term) |

### Sessions
| File | Tokens | Purpose | Updated By |
|------|--------|---------|------------|
| sessions/YYYY-MM-DD.md | ~500 | Individual session handoffs | Session Teacher (per session) |
| sessions/week-X-summary.md | ~800 | Weekly rollup | Term Orchestrator (weekly) |

### Agent Prompts
| File | Purpose |
|------|---------|
| prompts/course-leader.md | Monthly strategic planning instructions |
| prompts/term-orchestrator.md | Weekly/daily coordination instructions |
| prompts/session-teacher.md | Per-session teaching instructions |

### Templates
| File | Purpose |
|------|---------|
| templates/session-handoff.md | Post-session report format |
| templates/daily-brief.md | Pre-session brief format |
| templates/weekly-summary.md | End-of-week summary format |
| templates/term-summary.md | End-of-term summary format |

### Reference
| File | Purpose |
|------|---------|
| learningsystem.md | Original system design document |

### Learner Code (outside learning folder)
| Path | Purpose |
|------|---------|
| ../dev/web/ | React/Node web platform code |
| ../dev/unity/ | Unity/C# game code |

## Token Budget Guidelines

| Context Tier | Budget | Contents |
|--------------|--------|----------|
| Core (always) | 1-2K | learner-profile + current-focus |
| Working | 4-8K | Core + current-term + skills-log + recent session |
| Full review | 8-12K | Working + milestones + multiple term summaries |

**Warning**: Keep total context under 15K tokens to avoid "lost in the middle" effect.

---

## Update Cadence

| Agent | Frequency | Updates |
|-------|-----------|---------|
| Session Teacher | Per session | sessions/YYYY-MM-DD.md |
| Term Orchestrator | Weekly | curriculum/current-term.md, progress/skills-log.md, core/current-focus.md |
| Course Leader | Monthly | core/learner-profile.md, progress/milestones.md, curriculum/term-history/ |

---

## Archive Policy

- Sessions older than 30 days: Compress to single-paragraph summary
- Sessions older than 90 days: Compress to single-line entry in archive
- Term summaries: Keep full versions in term-history/
